GAURAV MAHAJAN 
Atlanta, GA 30062 • gauravmahajan19@gmail.com • (216) 482-4574 
                                   linkedin.com/in/gaurav-mahajan-12997235    
 
 
DIGITAL TRANSFOMATION & PRODUCT LEADER 
Program Management, Digital Transformations, Product Management  
⮚ An accomplished Product leader and Technology Consultant with over 17 years of experience in 
managing digital transformations and scaling e-commerce products & platforms for industry-leading 
companies, by seamlessly connecting people, process, and technology. 
⮚ Recognized for exceptional leadership and data-driven decision-making approach to project and 
product execution, with hands on experience in Agile and Waterfall delivery methodologies. 
⮚ Worked across geographies with fortune 500 companies while leading the execution of business-
critical digital transformations. 
⮚ A people person, with a strong track record of successfully building and leading cross functional &

critical digital transformations. 
⮚ A people person, with a strong track record of successfully building and leading cross functional & 
cross-cultural product teams, while executing multiple high visibility and strategic initiatives from 
inception to commercialization. 
⮚ An outcome-driven professional with a robust business acumen encompassing diverse domains, 
including financial management, talent acquisition, human resources, operations, product 
management, project leadership, and the orchestration of substantial teams exceeding 45 members.

ENCHANTING MATH ACADEMY NOV 2023 TILL PRESENT 
An Online Speed Math Platform - https://www.enchanting-math-academy.com/ 
 
FOUNDER & CEO 
• Developed an innovative online number math platform, revolutionizing mathematical education and nurturing numerical 
proficiency among students nationwide.  
• Successfully launched the Minimum Viable Product (MVP) in January 2024, initiating a pilot phase until April 2024 to assess 
product adoption and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) along the sales funnel.  
• Key metrics under scrutiny include campaign conversion rates, website traffic, overall conversion rates, and Customer 
Satisfaction (CSAT) scores. 
 
PAPA JOHNS ◦ Atlanta, GA ◦ AUG 2021 to JUN 2023 
One of the Top 5 Pizza brands in the US, with more than 3200 stores.

Satisfaction (CSAT) scores. 
 
PAPA JOHNS ◦ Atlanta, GA ◦ AUG 2021 to JUN 2023 
One of the Top 5 Pizza brands in the US, with more than 3200 stores. 
 
PRINCIPAL PRODUCT MANAGER - DIGITAL EXPERIENCE & LOYALTY 
(Reporting to VP Digital) 
Led the ecommerce growth and loyalty strategy for the primary Customer Experience channels encompassing  papajophns.com, 
mobile Apps (iOS & Android), Call Centers. Re-defined the PMO framework and ran the product-process execution group for the 
company. (> 2M weekly transactions / > $50M weekly revenue/ 12M budget/ Led 25+ member team) 
● Partnered with the executive leadership to identify fresh avenues of growth for the e-commerce and voice channels. 
● Established close synergy with product teams to outline, translate, and execute key initiatives across product roadmaps.  
● Co-authored and optimized product quarterly planning process in alignment with Papa John’s Executive stage gate process.

● Co-authored and optimized product quarterly planning process in alignment with Papa John’s Executive stage gate process. 
● Presented regular updates to Executive Leadership regarding the progress of key initiatives during the monthly stage gates. 
● Planned the resourcing and budgeting of capex projects while working with Finance, PMO, Engineering and marketing teams. 
● Oversaw key technology implementations for all the digital products from conception to commercialization. 
● Managed and mentored (directly and indirectly) product professionals including product managers, architects, engineers to 
execute key programs.

Key Projects & Results 
          ●       Conversational Voice AI POC implementation across 60 stores for the Voice channel, Integrated Order Management    
                  APIs with 3rd party AI vendors. Led to 8% increase in the gross margin, 54% reduction in call volume and 23% reduction  
                  Avg Handle Time for call centers. 
• Successfully spearheaded the launch of Loyalty Gift Cards tailored for Canadian customers.  
Orchestrated the product-side strategy to introduce PJ Gift Cards to the Canadian market, mirroring the successful model 
established in the US market. 
●         New Call center Agent Experience design/development and launch across 110 stores. Observed 13% reduction in AHT. 
●        Homepage and Checkout redesign to increase upsell. Led to an uptick of 14% to the AOV/ ticket. 
●        Make it Right initiative to bring down customer churn and improve store operations CSAT

●        Make it Right initiative to bring down customer churn and improve store operations CSAT 
         Led to 11.4% reduction in churn, 7% increase in customers’ buying propensity and 18% increase in CSAT. 
 
 
 
 
SKAVA (E-COMMERCE PLATFROM) ◦ Atlanta, GA ◦ APR 2016 to JUL 2021 
$120M, digital commerce startup that was acquired by Infosys with 600+ employees dispersed across 3 continents. 
 
PRODUCT PARTNER - CLIENT DELIVERY 
(Reporting to SVP PMO & Customer Success) 
Led the team of product managers, engineers, and project managers to preserve Skava's vision of enabling best in class digital 
eCommerce experience for large retailers in the US and globally. Defined a hybrid agile delivery methodology for project execution. 
Skava’s E-commerce SaaS suite featured a spectrum of microservices including Catalog & Inventory Management, Cart & Checkout, 
Order management, User, Recommendations Engine, Search, Wishlist and React based storefront studio to support multiple high

Order management, User, Recommendations Engine, Search, Wishlist and React based storefront studio to support multiple high 
impact digital initiatives for Fortune 100 companies across Retail, Auto and Financial domains. 
($21M revenue generation/ Led the P&L of a 45-member product and delivery team) 
 
Key Products & Clients Managed 
● Managed the discovery, design and implementation of ship-from-store functionality for rue21.com that resulted in an NPS of 
38% for deliveries, speeding up of deliveries by 64%, and a revenue increase of 28% across all the stores.[Pittsburgh, PA] 
● Oversaw the end-to-end process of integrating First Data with Huntington and Synchrony Bank's customer and card data, 
enabling seamless issuance of Gift Cards and facilitating card transactions. [Omaha, NE] 
● Supervised the re-design, loyalty integration and launch of Kraft-Heinz Company’s largest B2C digital channel

● Supervised the re-design, loyalty integration and launch of Kraft-Heinz Company’s largest B2C digital channel 
myfoodandfamily.com resulting in the platform to generate indirect sales for more than 200 brands in Kraft-Heinz family, with 
3M+ monthly active monthly users and 60K+ brand- and user-generated recipes across various categories. [Chicago, IL] 
● Steered the re-design and launch of Kraft-Heinz Company’s largest B2B digital channel kraftheinzingredients.com, that 
generates and influences 15% of the overall retail sales of Kraft-Heinz. [Chicago, IL] 
● Led the discovery, design, development, and launch of Vantiv Advantage mobile app (iOS & Android), within 5 weeks, that saw 
a customer adoption of 87% and resulted in a 23% increase in lead conversion in the 1st qtr. [Cincinnati, OH] 
● Partnered with Toyota Europe’s digital retailing team to implement a reserve and pay option for the Yaris GRMN that resulted

● Partnered with Toyota Europe’s digital retailing team to implement a reserve and pay option for the Yaris GRMN that resulted 
in all car inventory selling out in the first 2 weeks after launch. [Atlanta, GA] 
 
TATA CONSULTANCY SERVICES (TCS) ◦ Atlanta, GA I CANADA I UK I INDIA I ◦ 2006 to 2016 
$154 billion Mcap, digital business transformation & IT services/ consulting company with 600k employees.  
 
Sr. CONSULTANT I BUSINESS ANALYTICS, LOYALTY & DIGITAL TRANSFORMATIONS 
(Reporting to the Practice Head for Business & Digital Transformations) 
Managed digital transformations for clients across retail, banking, airline, and utilities industries. Worked on engagements of varying 
scopes, ranging from feasibility analysis to the development of business solutions. Each consulting endeavor afforded me the 
privilege of closely collaborating with multifaceted teams and embracing different cultures, in-depth data analysis, and

privilege of closely collaborating with multifaceted teams and embracing different cultures, in-depth data analysis, and 
comprehensive consideration of factors encompassing people, processes, and technology.                                                                                    
($52M revenue impact / Led and worked with product and delivery teams on various digital products and transformations)

● Led the business analysis for The Home Depot’s omni-channel commerce strategy implementation. Created the use cases and 
led the UAT for the order capturing channels while implementing IBM Sterling OMS for the 2200+ stores. [Atlanta, GA] 
● Led various product enhancements including Partner Loyalty integration of Delta Airlines with their Hotel Partners that resulted 
in a 0.2% conversion rate uptick. [Atlanta, USA] 
● Implemented an automated reporting solution for PNC Bank’s Exec office, decreasing manual work by 72%. [Cleveland, OH] 
● Re-designed the total cost of ownership system for RBC bank, decreasing the reconciliation errors by 23%. [Toronto, Canada] 
● Designed an activity-based costing framework around shared services for National Grid’s distribution & transmission business 
lines, while reducing the YoY cost by $0.56M USD. [Birmingham, United Kingdom]

lines, while reducing the YoY cost by $0.56M USD. [Birmingham, United Kingdom] 
● Co-authored the business go-to-market plan for the retail consulting arm of TCS India. Surveyed six lifestyle retailers to 
understand their pain points and market opportunities. We were able to convert win 4 RFPs into MSAs valued at $12M USD. 
[Delhi, India] 
●  Conducted the as-is study of Boeing’s HR processes and created the to-be process recommendations, while authoring the 
process flows in Visio. [Delhi, India] 
● Managed third-party software license sales in the media and entertainment industry for TCS of $2M USD. 
 
Education 
●        MBA (Marketing & Finance) ◦ ICFAI Business School, Mumbai, India ◦ 2004 - 2006                                                                                                                                              
University Topper in Business Research Methods (2005)

University Topper in Business Research Methods (2005)
